name: Boulevard du Crépuscule
text-muted: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

name: Assurance sur la mort
text-muted: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

name: Je suis un évadé
text-muted: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a Southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

name: Le gouffre aux chimères
text-muted: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

name: L'enfer est à lui
text-muted: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

name: Le troisième homme
text-muted: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

name: Rebecca
text-muted: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

name: La soif du mal
text-muted: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

name: Le Grand Chantage
text-muted: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

name: L'ultime razzia
text-muted: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

name: La nuit du chasseur
text-muted: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

name: La griffe du passé
text-muted: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

name: Le faucon maltais
text-muted: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

name: Règlement de comptes
text-muted: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

name: L'Inconnu du Nord-Express
text-muted: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

name: Les forbans de la nuit
text-muted: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

name: Le violent
text-muted: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

name: Les enchaînés
text-muted: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

name: Le grand sommeil
text-muted: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

name: Le roman de Mildred Pierce
text-muted: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

name: Le poison
text-muted: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

name: Laura
text-muted: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

name: Les fantastiques années 20
text-muted: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

name: Les anges aux figures sales
text-muted: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

name: Furie
text-muted: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

name: Quand la ville dort
text-muted: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

name: La rue rouge
text-muted: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

name: Le port de l'angoisse
text-muted: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

name: L'ombre d'un doute
text-muted: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

name: Key Largo
text-muted: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

name: Huit heures de sursis
text-muted: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

name: Le Charlatan
text-muted: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

name: Les tueurs
text-muted: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

name: Scarface
text-muted: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

name: Le port de la drogue
text-muted: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

name: Gun Crazy: Le démon des armes
text-muted: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

name: La cité sans voiles
text-muted: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

name: Les Démons de la liberté
text-muted: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

name: Gilda
text-muted: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

name: Péché mortel
text-muted: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married, but her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both as well as everyone around them.

name: La Femme au portrait
text-muted: A conservative middle aged professor engages in a relationship with a femme fatale, he's plunged into a nightmarish world of blackmail and murder.

name: La Lettre
text-muted: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

name: En quatrième vitesse
text-muted: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

name: La maison des otages
text-muted: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

name: La dame de Shanghai
text-muted: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

name: Les Passagers de la nuit
text-muted: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

name: La Maison du docteur Edwardes
text-muted: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

name: Adieu ma belle
text-muted: After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

name: La Grande Évasion
text-muted: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

name: Le faux coupable
text-muted: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.
